definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
If the father is a hero, the son is a real man. If the father is a reactionary, the son is a bastard. (Cultural Revolution slogan)/fig. like father, like son
pinyin: lao3 zi5 ying1 xiong2 er2 hao3 han4 , lao3 zi5 fan3 dong4 er2 hun2 dan4
containing_words.word: 老子英雄儿好汉，老子反动儿混蛋

sentences.english: He's a little kiss-ass bastard who'll do anything to get ahead.
sentences.chinese: 那个小混蛋是个马屁精，只要能往上爬，他啥事都干。

sentences.english: Yous fuckers need it more than I do.
sentences.chinese: 你这些混蛋比我需要它。

sentences.english: Oh, you are the jerk who disturbed my sleep last night.
sentences.chinese: 就是昨天晚上拍桌子打椅子害我们睡不着的那个混蛋。

sentences.english: As long as I never have to date another douchebag again.
sentences.chinese: 只要我不必再和混蛋约会。

sentences.english: This motherfucker man, won't shut up will you?
sentences.chinese: 你这个无耻混蛋，还不肯闭上嘴是吗？

sentences.english: Too bad his mother gets killed by an asshole named Frollo.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，他妈妈被一个叫浮罗洛的混蛋杀死了。

sentences.english: Oh, I'm thinking my lemon meringue.
sentences.chinese: 我想到我的柠檬混蛋白酥了。

sentences.english: Disloyal jerk that I was, I did nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我什么也没做，简直就是一个背叛朋友的混蛋。

sentences.english: He also said everyone I'd meet would be full of shit.
sentences.chinese: 他还说我将遇到的每个人都是十足的混蛋。

sentences.english: Asshole bosses typically work to undermine your self-confidence the whole time.
sentences.chinese: 混蛋老板通常工作，破坏你的自信的全部时间。

sentences.english: Kelli Ann: Welcome to my world, asshole.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到我的世界，混蛋。

sentences.english: Some people decide they're vicious pricks.
sentences.chinese: 有些人觉得他们是邪恶的混蛋。

sentences.english: If you are a shallow bitch, I can be a blunt jerk.
sentences.chinese: 如果妳是肤浅的贱货，那我可能是直率的混蛋。

sentences.english: The old rascal has promised his daughter to a cousin of the Seixas.
sentences.chinese: 那个老混蛋，把女儿许配给了赛克萨斯家的一个表亲。

sentences.english: While Brad Pitt who act in Inglourious Basterds ranks at third.
sentences.chinese: 出演《无耻混蛋》的布拉德皮特位居第三。

definition: see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
(derog.) old but still alive/old fart/old bastard
